June 5, 1982 D Ayrshire Entertainment Contest
Ayrshire Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
ayrshire-entertainment-contest
None
Elegy and Dance
Kilmarnock, East Ayrshire, Scotland, UK Bands had to play Gregson's Elegy and Dance, a solo, a march and a selection. Best soloist - M.Wilson of Whitburn. 8 bands competed.
Dec. 12, 2014, midnight Oct. 4, 2016, 2:53 p.m.
1 Whitburn Band Geoffrey Whitham
2 Kilmarnock Concert Brass Andrew Keachie
3 Dalmellington Band Archie Hutchison
